title: AGventure Awaits - Walking in High Cotton

subtasks: Sit in a vehicle.
Navigate bumpy dirt roads.
Observe agricultural fields.
Note crop rotation (corn to cotton).
Observe seed changing for different plant varieties.
Examine seed cleaning equipment.
Understand the process of seed utilization.
Notice the use of hoppers and seed brushes.
Understand the integration of different seeds.
Identify the challenges in using wheat as a cover crop.
Learn about the timing for picking cotton.
Familiarize with the cotton picker machinery.
Understand the process of picking and assembling cotton.
Observe the use of yellow triangles on the picker.
Understand the role of black tubes in cotton movement.
Note the formation of the basket and module.
Recognize the weight and handling of cotton modules.
Understand transportation of modules to a gin.
Know the separation process at the gin.
Learn the storage and sale of cotton.
Discuss the benefits of a large farm.
Understand the social aspect of farming (e.g., spending time with friends).
